parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> High Command

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Shows or hides [[High Command|high command]] bar. There must be some groups under HC command to show HC bar.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Since Arma 3 v1.93.145657 this command returns [[Nothing]] as it should</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''hcShowBar''' bool

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> bool: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] (prior to Arma 3 v1.93.145657 this command returned [[Object]] of [[objNull | null]] value)

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hcShowBar]] [[true]];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[hcShowBar]] [[false]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[High Command]], [[hcAllGroups]], [[hcGroupParams]], [[hcLeader]], [[hcRemoveAllGroups]], [[hcRemoveGroup]], [[hcSelected]], [[hcSelectGroup]], [[hcSetGroup]], [[hcShownBar]], [[onHCGroupSelectionChanged]]
</value></part></template>
